name: Pyaprs
body:
### pyAPRS
pyAPRS (by the lack of a good name) is a small client for APRS.
It's written in python using the GTK toolkit (pygtk) and currently supports [link to openstreetmap](openstreetmap.org) maps.
It aims at providing a simple to use, fast and lightweight node to the APRS network. It's not a replacement for other applications (like [link to Xastir](xastir.org)) but to complement them.

## Features
* Fast map scrolling and zooming
* Openstreetmap local cache for off-line use
* Full RF interfaces for TNC and soundmodem devices
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
